TopicTitle: K.S.S Kermania's Duna Trip [From a nubb] [[ALPHA]]

Articles.Content:
**The trip to the Red Planet**

Duna is a nice, little, red planet. Similar to Kerbin. And I haven't been to it. I've traveled to the Mun and Minmus, but Duna is left untouched. And we need to touch it. A lot. touch it all over

ANYHOO

Going to another planet in KSP looks to be an amazing and wonderful experience. I am glad to be part of this magnificent community and beautiful game. And part of the experience is visiting other moons, and eventually, other planets. So I decided to show all of you my experience. I hope you enjoy this as much as I will.

**SCHEDULE:** 

-New parts every weekend!

-Edits whenever I feel like it!

-Always make it awesome!

**PARTS:**

**IT'LL BE HERE BY THURSDAY I SWEAR**

**Previous missions to things:**

As I have mentioned, I have gone to the Mun and Minmus. Mun with a sort of Apollo-like lander, and Minmus with a tiny thingy. Also I hate trying to get captured by Minmus. so annoying. But my body is ready for Duna.

**THIS IS PROBABLY GONNA SUCK**

As of my knowledge, getting to Duna is going to be... not fun and games. I have a 'You're probably too dumb to know this so here's a calc thingy, you stupid' mod installed. (I'd say the name of it but I forgot). Second of all, I am going to make a kind of mothershippy rocket, and now that LV-Ns aren't as beautifully good anymore, this is gonna be even harder! Yay! Here's what I know about motherships:

-Have engines pull the ship, not push

-Put in space with individual parts, then dock together

-Try to be sane

-Don't forget stuff

-Don't put too many things on

I'm not gonna even go into having enough fuel, the lander, blah blah... I'ma just say there will be mining and probes. Foreshadowing, amirite?

**FORESHADOWING OF NEXT PART:**

-*Designing the rocket!*

*-Showing my design of mothership!*

*-Explosions!*

*-Failure.*

OTHER NOTES:

This was partially inspired by Developing Duna. I need to read that, and I've heard it's great. Kuddos to Brotoro. Next, I am pretty much a noob, as probably said in the title. I am not trying to be very professional, I just want to have a good time and make people laugh. Have a good day.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-12T00:30:00Z" title="05/12/2015 12:30  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 12, 2015</time> by polan**
The first part will come out on Wednesday or Thursday! What do YOU want to be in this little log that would be different from others?
